ygData.subject: Re: Magicians and Wizards (irritation)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, the latter would be something nice. A 12-level spell Backtrip or something like that, that teleports one member of your group to bind. Make it
ygData.messageBody:
According to robert.dodd@...:
> Wizards are supposed to be masters of teleportation, right? So why can't we
> have little perks like two bind points, or the ability to group teleport
> back to our bind location, or a spell to teleport someone else, in group, to
> their bind spot? Sure would make traveling and acquiring knowledge a lot
> quicker...

Actually, the latter would be something nice. A 12-level spell "Backtrip" or
something like that, that teleports one member of your group to bind. Make
it a lot slower than Gate and more mana expensive, and you have a good
intermediate.

You have a lack of teleport between level 8 (Shadow Step) and the level 20
Portals.
--
